label: AB_hR4_166_c_c-006
title: ZrBr Structure
comments:
Rhombohedral \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_hR4_166_c_c-005}{ZrCl} and \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_hR4_166_c_c-006}{ZrBr} have the same AFLOW prototype label, AB\_hR4\_166\_c\_c, and the ICSD lists both structures under structure type ZrCl. 
 However, the stacking order and the intra-layer atom distance is substantially different in the two systems, so we separate them. 
 The structures are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
